title: Need Fond ID Please / 'molotov'
content:
Hi can someone please ID the "molotov" font on this image:

[http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b52/ZStarD/MolotovFullFinal.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825174357/http:/i17.photobucket.com/albums/b52/ZStarD/MolotovFullFinal.jpg "http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b52/ZStarD/MolotovFullFinal.jpg")

Thanks.
author: landondonovan10

comments.content:
It's very simmilar to ITC's "Bauhaus Bold". Not sure if it's an exact match though?  
 [http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=201589](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825174357/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=201589 "http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=201589")

This one: [Expressa heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825174357/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/expressa/heavy) looks like a match (reduced letterspacing of course).

Andreas

Edit: The link syntax doesn't work at the beginning of a posting. Putting "This one:" in front helped.
In either case, the logo was modified in order to have l and t of equal heights.
